snippet.title: Trivial Pursuit Unhinged PS2 Multiplayer Gameplay (Atari) Playstation 2 [Unhinged Mode]
snippet.description:
In this video we test out the Unhingeed mode on the Playstation 2 game Trivial Pursuit Unhinged. 
Ive never really been a fan of trivial pursuit, and in honesty neither of us knows the rules, so this video will be a complete blunder to anyone familiar with the game.  But we decided to upload the video anyway. 
In the video theres a glitch where one question plays a loop of white noise instead of a song sample, does anyone know if its like that on all versions of the game?
Please leave a comment below and help us out with some Trivial Pursuit tips so we can do a better more challenging video. 
thanks for watching, and please subscribe.
